This report has condensed a large amount of research from the community to show just how far we have come. Browse through and see all the exciting projects, speakers, fellows and more that have come from OSHWA as well as the open source hardware community at large. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"It’s incredibly gratifying to see the vast array of focuses, fields and creations within the community and we are so proud to be able to be a part of it.
